channel.title: Unique pking
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/197/7qle.png/][IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6638/7qle.png[/img][/URL] Exile Pk is a login and pk server, alternatively you can boss or use minigames to your advantage. Skilling is also available.
[url=http://exilepk.x10host.com/client.html]Click here to play via the webclient.[/url] [url=http://exilepk.x10host.com/web.html]Click here to play with our alternative webclient.[/url] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/f2hlr192wyy06sh/client.jar]Click here to download our client.[/url] [url=http://exilepkforum.createaforum.com/]Click here to visit the forums.[/url][/center]
[SIZE=5]Some features:[/SIZE] [ul][*]Players can now buy custom titles! [*]Cache takes 1 minute to download, then you can begin playing! [*]Perfected hybridding! [*]Weekly pking events and general miscellaneous events! [*]Toggable hitmarks, hit point bar and X10 hits! [*]Fully working PvP items with special attacks including korasi and dragon claws! [*]Stable server, without lagg and a 99.9% uptime. [*]Perfected client sided switching. [*]Superb combat, absolutely fantastic. [*]Killing streak system - the higher your killstreak the better your rewards. [*]Kills and death ratio - there's also a kill store which have a wide variety of items. [*]Manage your kills via our ingame kills scoreboard. [*]Over 10 bosses to battle against. [*]Fully working curse prayers. [*]Barrows store, pk point store, kill point store, activity point store, etcetera! [*]Perfected EP system - gives your normal loot plus a pvp drop! [*]Over 5 minigames to endure, including Barbarian assault. [*]Randomized PvP loots - when you kill a player. [*]Activity point system - the longer your online the more points you get, spend these on items.[/ul]
And lots more features, just login and give us a chance!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/849/h35d.png/][IMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/5817/h35d.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/x7m.png/][IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/9156/x7m.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/836/ga19.png/][IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/4062/ga19.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/138/zsdf.png/][IMG]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/1636/zsdf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/9/gdnr.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/6959/gdnr.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/713/wmsf.png/][IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/5356/wmsf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/836/qzzm.png/][IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/8079/qzzm.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/843/1nt.png/][IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/6339/1nt.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/545/zoed.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/4197/zoed.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/706/v3b7.png/][IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2702/v3b7.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/827/ob5.gif/][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/8950/ob5.gif[/img][/URL]
[url=http://exilepk.x10host.com/client.html]Click here to play via the webclient.[/url] [url=http://exilepk.x10host.com/web.html]Click here to play with our alternative webclient.[/url] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/f2hlr192wyy06sh/client.jar]Click here to download our client.[/url] [url=http://exilepkforum.createaforum.com/]Click here to visit the forums.[/url]

item.title: Unique pking
item.dc:creator: @Dave_is_pro Dave is pro
item.description:
@Dave_is_pro wrote:

Played this server for a week, Got banned for PKP ‘FARMING’

Let alone that i’ve never pkp farmed…
Eco is FUCKED UP… BIGTIME.
duel arena was released. I cleaned 4 people… ::duel gets removed next day. #Logic
Advice… Don’t join their a bunch of kids.

Read full topic
